p: Our study shows higher NCD comorbidity prevalence in confirmed COVID-19 cases than China but lower than the USA and European countries, except for diabetes. China reported hypertension present in 16.37–21.1% of studies, diabetes in 7.87–9.7% and smoking in 7.63% ( 4, 5, 26). Among hospitalized patients in New York, hypertension was reported at 56.6%, obesity at 41.7, and diabetes at 33.8% ( 9). Italy reports 17% of admissions diabetes, 49% hypertension, and 21% cardiovascular disease; in Sweden: 23% diabetes, 34% hypertension, and 16% chronic lung disease; while in Spain: 17% presented diabetes and 30% had cardiovascular disease ( 27).
